Name: familial adenomatous polyposis 1
Definition: A familial adenomatous polyposis that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the APC gene on chromosome 5q22.
Synonym: nonsyndromic cleft lip with or without cleft palate 12

Name: familial adenomatous polyposis 2
Definition: A familial adenomatous polyposis that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the MUTYH gene on chromosome 1p34.

Name: familial adenomatous polyposis 3
Definition: A familial adenomatous polyposis that has_material_basis_in homozygous or compound heterozygous mutation in the NTHL1 gene on chromosome 16p13.

Name: familial adenomatous polyposis 4
Definition: A familial adenomatous polyposis characterized by the development of multiple colonic adenomas in adulthood
